mapper.select: select rr.* from (select r.*, rownum rnum from (select b.*, f.grade from (select * from USER_RECORD where id=#{id}) b LEFT join USER_GRADE f on b.buy_total>=f.STANDARD order by ROWNUM desc) r) rr where rr.rnum = 1
select f.*, p.pro_name from (select b.*, s.state s from (SELECT * FROM ORDERTBL WHERE user_id=#{id}) b left join STATE s on b.state=s.state_NUM) f left join PRODUCTTBL p on f.pro_num=p.pro_num
select rr.* from (select r.*, rownum rnum from (select * from q_and_a where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc)r)rr where rr.rnum <=5
select rr.* from (select r.*, rownum rnum from (select * from counsel where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc)r)rr where rr.rnum <=5
select * from counsel where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc
mapper.insert: insert into counsel(num, cate, user_id, title, content, counsel_date, image_uuid) values (counsel_seq.nextval, #{cate}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{fileuuid})
